query:
SELECT (metadata.id,
                track,
                artist,
                album,
                date,
                channels,
                channel,
                start_time,
                duration,
                sample_rate,
                source_url,
                title,
                thumbnail)
                 FROM metadata
                INNER JOIN playlist_track ON playlist_track.metadata_id = metadata.id
                WHERE playlist_track.playlist_id = $1
